activities: Fusion Company and its subsidiaries may collect and use personal information received from the EU for the purposes of (1) offering and selling products/services to customers or those of its partners, suppliers, distributors, and affiliates; (2) providing information or services for such products/services to customers or those of its partners, suppliers, distributors, and affiliates; (3) administering products/services and coordinating benefits for its customers or those of its partners, suppliers, distributors, and affiliates, including but not limited to adjudicating issues, conducting quality/satisfaction assessments, or fraud prevention; and (4) purposes to which individuals have otherwise consented.
contacttitle1: Director of Security, Compliance, Privacy and Governance
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Insurance Services - (INS)Travel & Tourism Services - (TRA)Health Care Services - (HCS)
privacyprograms: Self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
